Ingredients: Minced beef, Garlic, Ginger, Soy Sauce, Brown Sugar, Sesame Oil, Gochujang, Rice Vinegar, White Rice
Instructions: Cook beef with garlic and ginger until browned. Add sauce, simmer briefly, and serve over rice.

Ingredients: Chicken, Garlic, Ginger, Turmeric, Coreander, Cumin, Brown sugar, Fish sauce
Instructions: Marinate chicken, skewer, then grill or pan-fry until cooked. Serve with satay sauce.

Ingredients: Brown Sugar, Fish Sauce, Tamarind puree, Oyster Sauce, Canola oil, Onion, Garlic, Chicken Breast, Eggs, Beansprouts, Garlic Chives, Peanuts, Rice noodles
Instructions: Soften noodles. Stir-fry protein, egg, noodles, and sauce until well mixed and heated through.

Ingredients: Elbow Pasta, Garlic, Parmesan, Lemon Juice, Chicken Bouillon Cube, Half and half, Chicken Broth
Instructions: Cook pasta. Toss with melted butter, garlic, seasoning, and parmesan.

Ingredients: Salmon Fillets, Soy Sauce, Mirin, Brown Sugar, Garlic, Ginger, Sesame Oil, White Rice
Instructions: Mix sauce ingredients. Pan-sear salmon, add sauce, and simmer until glazed. Serve over rice.

Ingredients: Minced Beef, Taco Seasoning, Garlic, Onion, Tomato Paste, Taco Shells, Lettuce, Cheese
Instructions: Cook beef with seasoning and onion. Fill taco shells and top as desired.

Ingredients: Fettuccine, Chicken Breast, Garlic, Butter, Heavy Cream, Parmesan, Black Pepper
Instructions: Cook pasta. Cook chicken separately. Combine with cream sauce and parmesan.

Ingredients: Broccoli, Carrots, Bell Peppers, Snow Peas, Garlic, Ginger, Soy Sauce, Sesame Oil, Rice
Instructions: Stir-fry vegetables in oil. Add sauce and cook until tender-crisp. Serve over rice.

Ingredients: Shrimp, White Rice, Eggs, Soy Sauce, Garlic, Green Onions, Sesame Oil, Peas, Carrots
Instructions: Scramble eggs, remove. Cook shrimp, add rice and vegetables, return eggs, and season.

Ingredients: Canned Tomatoes, Onion, Garlic, Vegetable Broth, Heavy Cream, Butter, Basil
Instructions: Cook onion and garlic in butter. Add tomatoes and broth, simmer, blend, stir in cream.

Ingredients: Beef Strips, Mushrooms, Onion, Garlic, Beef Broth, Sour Cream, Egg Noodles, Butter
Instructions: Cook beef and set aside. Cook vegetables, add broth, simmer, stir in sour cream, serve over noodles.

Ingredients: Chicken Breast, Romaine Lettuce, Parmesan, Caesar Dressing, Croutons, Olive Oil, Black Pepper
Instructions: Grill chicken. Toss lettuce with dressing, top with chicken, parmesan, and croutons.

Ingredients: Red Lentils, Onion, Garlic, Ginger, Curry Powder, Cumin, Coconut Milk, Diced Tomatoes, Rice
Instructions: Cook onion and spices. Add lentils, tomatoes, and coconut milk. Simmer until tender. Serve over rice.

Ingredients: Pork Shoulder, BBQ Sauce, Brown Sugar, Paprika, Garlic Powder, Burger Buns, Coleslaw
Instructions: Slow cook pork with seasoning. Shred and mix with sauce. Serve on buns with slaw.
